title: Model railroading unlimited
creator_credit: Liberty Pictures, Mike O'Connell and Rick Harper
brief_description: A young man’s growing interest in his hobby - model railroading - serves as the focus for comedy, intricate and elaborate layouts, and a climatic finale involving several trains running out of control on a super-sized track.
creator_credit_for_label: Liberty Pictures, Mike O’Connell and Rick Harper
